text: Manuel Lorenzo Justiniano de Zavala y Sanchez (October 14, 1788 â€“ November 15, 1836), known simply as Lorenzo de Zavala, was a Mexican physician, politician, diplomat and author. Zavala was the interim Vice President of the Republic of Texas in 1936. ==References== Category:1788 births Category:1836 deaths Category:Mexican politicians
title: Lorenzo de Zavala
